attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for children to wear a safety helmet when cycling on the road or pavements.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently children are allowed to ride their bikes on the roads and pavements without wearing a safety helmet.
Helmets are nowadays readily available at many outlets at reasonable prices and for the safety and protection of children we feel that it should be a mandatory requirement for all children to own and wear one.

Children cannot be expected to recognize the consequences of not wearing a helmet but by making it a legal requirement to wear one it would help to safeguard children whilst out riding.
